title: The Disembodied (1957) with Allison Hayes
description:
The Disembodied (1957)  starring Allison Hayes

Run time  1 hr 6 mins.

IMDb number  tt0050317

Director:  Walter Grauman
Writer:    Jack Townley
Stars:     Paul Burke, Allison Hayes, John Wengr 

Summary

 A photographer on an expedition in the jungle runs afoul of a voodoo cult.

Notes from the container.

  'Before she was the title character in "Attack of the 50 Foot Woman,"  voluptuous Allison Hayes was a whole lotta female in this horror thriller set in the steamy African jungle....  A preposterously enjoyable mix of magic and murder.  The Disembodied demonstrates why Hayes was headed for B-horror movie glory.'

My notes.

   "The Disembodied" is the Allison Hayes film you've been waiting for.  I looked on my fileshare search engine and see no listing for this so I made the torrent.  Like it says Allison Hayes is known for "Attack of the 50 Foot Woman."     She is the real star in top billing with Paul Burke for "The Disembodied."   And there's plenty of the 1950's Capri pants and seductive costuming plus some Voodoo dancing by Allison which will endear the film to all her fans.  See IMDb for other titles.  "The Hypnotic Eye" is one which is available on torrents.

An archive remastered version is available currently and suitable for library collections.  Please seed for others to enjoy
